title: Execute Performance Test Suite
description: As a performance engineer, I want to run load testing scenarios so that I can validate system scalability under stress.
soThat: I can validate system scalability under stress
acceptanceCriteria: Given baseline metrics exist, when load tests execute, then response times remain under 2 seconds
Given concurrent users increase, when system is stressed, then throughput scales linearly
Given resource limits are reached, when monitoring alerts, then graceful degradation occurs
